page.title: 04Religion in Harden
page.content: We have two places of worship in the village, St. Saviours Church and the Congregational Chapel. The Church was built in 1892, the Chapel was built in 1847. The minister and the vicar both start their days early in the morning. The vicar is supposed to only work a six day week but both gentleman said they were always available to anyone needing their help. During the week their time is spent studying, visiting and preparing sermons. The people attending services tend to be the very young and the elderly. There are less people attending places of worship now than there used to be.
